= Event =
== URL ==
`http://partake.in/api/1/event/<event_id>`

== Response sample ==
{{{
{
  "id": "test_id",
  "title": "sample event",
  "summary": "a sample event to explain partake api",
  "category": "neta",
  "deadline": "2011/05/20 18:00",
  "beginDate": "2011/05/20 20:00",
  "endDate": "2011/05/20 22:00",
  "capacity": 20,
  "url": "http://partake.in/",
  "place": "here",
  "address": "somewhere",
  "description": "<p>hogehoge</p>",
  "hashTag": "#partakein",
  "ownerId": "1234567890",
  "managerIdList": ["1234567890a", "1234567890b"],
  "isPrivate": false,
  "createdAt": "2011/05/19 12:00",
  "modifiedAt": "2011/05/19 15:00"
}
}}}


if your request is rejected, partake-server response 400(Bad Request).
if specified event doesn't exist, partake-server response 404(Not Found).

== How to access through partake.js ==
{{{
var event = $.partake().event('<event_id>');
if (!!event) {
  $('#title').text(event.title);
}
}}}
